General.Name: Beijing Deep Glint Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Beijing Deep Glint Technology Co., Ltd. develops an artificial intelligence-based computer vision, data intelligence, and temperature measurement application software. It serves bank outlets, treasury, office buildings, industrial parks, and other fields. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: 1A025, 101, No. 1, Wangjing East Road, Beijing, China, 100091
